treatment-md.title: Ethmia laphamorum Phillips-Rodriguez, Powell, Hallwachs & Janzen, 2014, sp. n.
treatment-md.article-title: A synopsis of the genus Ethmia Huebner in Costa Rica: biology, distribution, and description of 22 new species (Lepidoptera, Gelechioidea, Depressariidae, Ethmiinae), with emphasis on the 42 species known from Area de Conservacion Guanacaste
